label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_007
content:

- PD ID: RB-PD-0730
  - Description: Dose adjustment documentation incomplete
  - Severity: minor

### Events
- eCRF query resolution: 20 queries closed this week
- Site 06 monitoring visit completed, 3 findings
- Lab kit resupply dispatched to sites with low inventory

### Notes
- Week 7: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 71 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
